Sentence.sentence: I don't attend services when I am there, and I have never meditated, there or anywhere; I just take walks and read and lose myself in the stillness, recalling that it is only by stepping briefly away from my wife and bosses and friends that I will have anything useful to bring to them.

sentences.en: Some people think that husband and wife should never work together.

entry.def: A man's wife is the woman he is married to.

example.ex: He married his wife Jane 37 years ago...
The woman was the wife of a film director.
example.tran: 这个女人是一个电影导演的妻子。

means.word_mean: 1. a married woman; a man's partner in marriage

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wīf 'woman', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wijf and German Weib

sentences.cn: 卡罗尔:你的夫人和孩子也好 吧 ?

sentences.cn: 你的老婆太迷人了. 真是让人目不转睛.
sentences.en: Your wife is really gorgeous. I can't take my eyes off her.

sentences.cn: 是不是想看到我脸红了你才满意, 老婆大人?
sentences.en: Not want to see you before am satisfied with the blush, wife adults?

sentences.cn: 开始时,他老婆对花了这么多钱就不那么起劲了.
sentences.en: He says his wife was less than enthused about the expensive concept.

sentences.cn: 接著我老婆走上楼时,就发现了那只蝙蝠.
sentences.en: And then my wife went upstairs and discovered the bat.

sentences.cn: 不是那个存货的汽车参赛者没有老婆.
sentences.en: Not that stock car racers don't have wives.

sentences.cn: 老婆和老公的好朋友私奔了.
sentences.en: My wife ran away with my best friend.

sentences.cn: 你知道你老婆打给法兰克说家里连暖气都被停了 吗 ?
sentences.en: You know your wife called Frankie and told him the fucking heat's off?

sentences.cn: 我老婆每天锻炼一小时以保持身体健康.
sentences.en: My wife do excise one hour a day to hold health.

sentences.cn: 我老婆和我想搬到西部去. ”
sentences.en: My wife and I want to go West. "

sentences.cn: 我俩的老婆都烦透了,因为我和约翰壹个晚上都在大谈生意经.
sentences.en: Our wives were annoyed because John and I spent the whole evening talking shop.

sentences.cn: 他受老婆摆布.
sentences.en: He is run by his wife.

sentences.cn: 老婆在冰箱取出烤鸭, 洋洋自得说: 大老2!
sentences.en: Wife takes out roast duck in freezer, say jauntily: Big old 2!

sentences.cn: 我希望我老婆不仅漂亮迷人,而且还风趣、大方.
sentences.en: I want my wife to be glamorous but funny and generous as well.

sentences.cn: 他以前总是挑老婆的不是.
sentences.en: He used to pick on his wife.

sentences.cn: 他失了业, 老婆也离他而去, 倒楣事一而再地发生.
sentences.en: He lost his job, and his wife left him. It was a double whammy.

sentences.cn: 我的老婆真令我苦恼.
sentences.en: My wife is a real torment to me.

sentences.cn: 如果红日高照时下雨, 就是撒旦在打老婆.
sentences.en: If it rained while the sun was shining, the Devil was beating his wife.

sentences.cn: 生一计, 用线绳把自己的宝贝绑起来, 让老婆扑了个空.
sentences.en: Unripe one plan, use cotton rope to bind his baby, let wife attack empty.

sentences.cn: 苏珊: 他老婆雇了这镇上最没有道德的律师.
sentences.en: Susan: The wife hired the sleaziest, most unethical divorce lawyer in town.

sentences.cn: 我希望有一个能替我做饭而且烹调技术还很不错的老婆.
sentences.en: I want a wife who cooks the meals, a wife who is a good cook.

sentences.cn: 他实在不想将情人交给自己的老婆.
sentences.en: He was loath to surrender his sweetheart to his wife.

sentences.cn: 成功的男人挣的钱老婆花不完.
sentences.en: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend.

sentences.cn: 我要叫我老婆让所有的女人都显得小家子气.
sentences.en: I want my wife to make all the other women feel small.

sentences.cn: 他得知老婆作胎的消息后,高兴得跳了起来.
sentences.en: He jumped for joy when he knew that his wife was pregnant.

sentences.cn: 人们把那个怕老婆的男人叫“妻管严”.
sentences.en: People refer the man who was afraid of his wife as henpecked.

sentences.cn: 我老婆这会儿却说不定在哪儿鬼混哩.
sentences.en: My wife is fooling around probably right this minute.

sentences.cn: 它对满腹牢骚的女友或老婆只字未提.
sentences.en: It doesn't say anything about grouchy girlfriends or wives.

sentences.cn: 我问过几百个男人:他们是否向老婆或者热恋中的另一半扯过谎.
sentences.en: I asked hundreds of them about the little fibs they tell their wives or significant others.

sentences.cn: 一个把自己的老婆也拖下水的赌徒.
sentences.en: A gambler who dragged his wife down.

sentences.cn: 他抱怨说他老婆总是在找茬儿骂人, 他想跟她离婚.
sentences.en: He complains that his wife is hell on wheels; he is considering getting a divorce.

sentences.cn: 给已婚妇女备有一份嫁妆,或者称为“decimum”,以使其受到保护.
sentences.en: As a wife , the woman was protected by the setting up of a dowry or decimum.

sentences.cn: 已婚妇女必须携带结婚证。
sentences.en: Wives will have to bring along their marriage certificate.

Sentence.sentence: I did all the cooking myself and my wife waited on tables.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Social workers discover that the wife normally tries to take care of her husband herself for as long as she can in order not to use up their life savings
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He and his wife did everything by themselves.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Barbara Sanders is a wife and the mother of two children, ages 2 and 4.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And here's one more: We went on a campaign trip once in Italy, and my wife spent the whole time worrying about bats getting into her hair.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: But a new study finds that the risk of divorce among older couples rises when the wife——not the husband一becomes seriously ill.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C
